item.title: Freelance Executive Producer - Upwork
item.description:
Location: Dubai

We are seeking a Freelance Executive Producer based in Dubai to lead the production of a new show similar in style to "David Letterman - My Next Guest." This role requires someone with direct experience in producing high-profile interview-style shows.

Responsibilities:
- Oversee all aspects of production from pre-production planning to post-production edits.
- Maintain the show’s vision and ensure it aligns with the quality and style of high-profile interview shows.

How to Apply:
Please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your experience with similar productions. Include any relevant links or portfolio items that demonstrate your ability to produce a show of this caliber.
We are looking forward to learning how your background aligns with our project needs.


Posted On: June 23, 2024 17:09 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Communications
Skills: Video Production, Communications
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Creative Social Media Content Creator & Reel Specialist for Real Estate - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative Social Media Content Creator & Reel Specialist to join our real estate team. As a specialist, you will be responsible for developing and executing engaging social media content strategies to promote our properties and services. This includes creating captivating visuals, videos, and written content that aligns with our brand and resonates with our target audience.
        Skills needed:
        - Proficiency in social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn)
        - Experience in creating high-quality visual content and videos
        - Strong writing and editing skills
        - Knowledge of real estate industry
        - Ability to analyze social media data and optimize content strategies

        Size: Medium
        Duration: 1 to 3 months
        Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $5.00-$11.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 17:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Facebook, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Facebook, Instagram
Country: CAN
click to apply

item.title: Motion Graphics Expert who can work with CSV Files and After Effects - Upwork
item.description:
I need a short Instagram reel.
The reel will compare price movements and returns of two stocks over last X years.

I will provide you with 2 CSV files containing data for each stocks.

For delivery I need the project files (premier- after effects, etc) along with mp4.

Example of the kind of video I need - https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6a3KMpSIiy/?igsh=NnVuZG5xcXcyNjVr

My Channel is - https://instagram.com/retirewithrohit

If you can do this, please let me know.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 23, 2024 17:00 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: YouTube Video Creation and Editing - Upwork
item.description:
YouTube channel with promising early results needs a Video Editor. I have many hours of raw drone and gopro video along with hundreds of photos. I am seeking someone to take my raw images and video then create lots of content for my channel. The goal is 1 long video of 12-20 minutes in length, per week. I already have an intro and outro, logos, branding, etc.

Budget: $60

item.title: Video editing - Upwork
item.description:
I need a interview like video edited for my company I have a logo I need writing with my artist name of my company  and maybe some ect, writing.
I have a music video I need the music in the video the video being played in the back ground and the song being played. I'll send you the full details.

item.title: Sizzle Reel for Photographer - Upwork
item.description:
Need a sophisticated, classy sizzle reel to promote my fine art photography targeted to galleries who will want to exhibit my work. Should be a combination of artwork images and text, press coverage received (headlines and logos), and video of me in action, as well as speaking about my work.

The video sizzle reel should be about 1 1/2-2 minutes tops, with appropriate music where I am not speaking. The project must be completed in two to three weeks. I will be available for consultation and to review progress. I will provide all the necessary files.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 16:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Showreel, Video Editing, Trailer, Video Production
Skills: Showreel, Video Editing, Trailer, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor and Director for a Vlogging channel - Upwork
item.description:
Only looking for the best of the best video editors.

If you do not have experience editing for a vlogging Youtube channel please DO NOT apply.

We're looking for an expert video editor to edit the vlogs of our founder

The vlog will aim to be cinematic, entertaining and educational which will mean you editing skills will also require directing and visionary skills to make the vlog stand out against typical vlogs

This is the perfect opportunity to truly explore your creative vision with video editing for this vlog

Budget: $10,000

item.title: Digital Product Promotional Video - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for an experinced video creator for a digital product.

I sell a real estate CRM and I am looking for a promotional video to be created around 1.5 minutes to use on my website.

I can provide a rough script but expect it to be made better.
I will also provide some screen recordings that can be used however you'd like.

I would like background music and possibly animations to make the video more engaging.

Please reach out with examples of other videos you've done for digital products.


Posted On: June 23, 2024 16:16 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Editing, Explainer Video

item.title: Reels Editor Fluent in English - Upwork
item.description:
Content creator and content marketing agency owner is looking for a long-term collaboration with a detail-oriented editor.

The beginning of the collaboration consists in captioning my personal Reels. Based on quality, I might decide in a near future to expand the collaboration and assign bigger projects.

Fluent english, perfectionism and willingness to learn and improve are required. I can train you for the rest, but not for these traits.

Please check the training, complete the sample, and send it over if interested.

Pay: starting from $8/reel (up to 30 reels/month)
(Check the tutorial before judging the pay. More often than not, it's basically just adding captions)

https://shadowed-drawbridge-bf6.notion.site/Editing-sample-8bbf5f16c01c4b7f859cf9871baa2769?pvs=4


Budget: $240
Posted On: June 23, 2024 16:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, 360-Degree Video Editing, DaVinci Resolve, English, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, 360-Degree Video Editing, DaVinci Resolve, English, Video Editing
Country: Italy
click to apply
